TopicTitle: how to find node points and 3d file in blender

Articles.Content: How do i find the node attach points in blender and i have been making 3d model DAEs but all of them could not be loaded in KSP.The part cfg was all corrected but still could not load.

in Blender selecting the point where you want this connection with one click, then you see the coordinates (x, y, z) in 3D cursor, this what you see in the upper right corner of the window with the logo of (+)

Check the console when it\'s stuck on your part (ALT+F2 to open) to see what\'s causing the problem.

Do you have a node_collider object?

in Blender selecting the point where you want this connection with one click, then you see the coordinates (x, y, z) in 3D cursor, this what you see in the upper right corner of the window with the logo of (+)

thanks but how do put the numbers in the part cfg?
